name: At Night (itch)
description:
It's night time, and this is definitely not your room. What happened? Overcome your fears and find a way out.

Game submitted to Ludum Dare 37: "One room"

Arrow keys or WASD to move.

Backspace to restart.

Escape to exit.

Made with Game Maker:Studio 1.4

Font: "m3x6" by managore
Sprite software: Aseprite
Music software: Tuxguitar
